name: Goop of the Innocent
description:
This is a submission for the 50th Godot Wild Jam, build in a little above 72 hours.
(Windows version for a more stable experience).

In Goop of the Innocent, You play as a random guy who suddenly wakes up in a forest filled with soldiers of light. Something calls out to you, needing you to sacrifice these poor souls.

Sneak around the light and stay in the dark. Execute and sacrifice to win and survive.

----------------

If you're stuck:

  • WASD to move around
  • SPACE or SHIFT to run
  • RMB to attack
  • LMB to throw a Kunai
  • Q to drag a body when near one
  • E to sacrifice the enemy on the spot to recieve a kunai

----------------

This is my submission, hope it's fun! I tried to make it as fast as possible, since i haven't done this in a long time and this also being my second ever game jam. Also, i have school work :P.  Also alsoooo, because of me being stupid and coding as fast as possible, i might've created some bug -_0, but it should be fine anyway!

I was very much going for a GBA aesthetic, so i hope you like it!

Thank you for playing!

----------------

Credits:

  • Opengameart.org and Freesound.org for cc0 sounds and music i could use and mix.
  • Godotshaders.com for some shaders
  • The art, gamedesign and programming is by me, Tenseven ;)
